recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Teknik Komputer, Teknologi Game (Sarjana)
job_description:
Strong understanding of 3D/2D game mechanics, physics, and animation systems
Experience in building VR/AR applications
Familiar with URP, shader graph, and lighting optimization
Good knowledge of performance profiling & memory optimization
Experience with Git version control
Familiar with mobile & cross-platform deployment (Android, iOS, PC)
Plus: experience in multiplayer/networked applications (Photon, Mirror, etc.)
